title: Arudal aLikkum
sahitya:
Arudal aLikkum nEsanE shuddAtmanAna hrdaya vAsanE


anupallavi

  vEru vEu samaya bhEdam viTTun aruLaip-paTri ninru
viruppilAdu veruppilAdu serukkilAdu sEvai sheyyum


caraNam    kuzhalaip-pOlak-konjum isaiyum kuzhandai pOlat-teLinda manamum
ezhilaip-parappum iravi nilaiyum Indananta shAntamAga
